================
CODE SNIPPETS
================
TITLE: Keystatic Environment Variables
DESCRIPTION: Required environment variables for running the Keystatic development app locally. These include secrets and client IDs necessary for authentication and operation.

SOURCE: https://github.com/thinkmill/keystatic/blob/main/dev-projects/next-app/README.md#_snippet_0

LANGUAGE: bash
CODE:
```
KEYSTATIC_SECRET=...
KEYSTATIC_GITHUB_CLIENT_ID=...
KEYSTATIC_GITHUB_CLIENT_SECRET=...
```

--------------------------------

TITLE: Run Keystatic Development Server with npm
DESCRIPTION: Starts the development server for the Astro project with Keystatic integrated. This command allows you to view and interact with your site locally during development.

SOURCE: https://github.com/thinkmill/keystatic/blob/main/templates/astro/README.md#_snippet_1

LANGUAGE: bash
CODE:
```
npm run dev
```

--------------------------------

TITLE: Heading Text Variant Configuration
DESCRIPTION: Shows an example of configuring text variants, such as headings, using semantic names instead of t-shirt sizes. This approach bundles all necessary font properties like color, family, size, and weight.

SOURCE: https://github.com/thinkmill/keystatic/blob/main/design-system/primitives/README.md#_snippet_2

LANGUAGE: json
CODE:
```
{
  "color": "{some.value}",
  "fontFamily": "{some.value}",
  "fontSize": "{some.value}",
  "fontWeight": "{some.value}",
  "lineHeight": "{some.value}",
  "textTransform": "{some.value}"
}
```

--------------------------------

TITLE: Run Keystatic Create Locally
DESCRIPTION: Command to run the Keystatic create package locally for development and testing purposes.

SOURCE: https://github.com/thinkmill/keystatic/blob/main/packages/create/README.md#_snippet_1

LANGUAGE: bash
CODE:
```
pnpm dev:create
```

--------------------------------

TITLE: Run Keystatic Development App
DESCRIPTION: Command to start the Keystatic development application. After execution, the Admin UI can be accessed via the `/keystatic` route.

SOURCE: https://github.com/thinkmill/keystatic/blob/main/dev-projects/next-app/README.md#_snippet_1

LANGUAGE: bash
CODE:
```
pnpm run dev
```

--------------------------------

TITLE: Figma Color Collection JSON Structure
DESCRIPTION: Defines the structure of a Figma color collection file, including modes, variable IDs, and detailed variable definitions with resolved values by mode. This format is used to represent design tokens.

SOURCE: https://github.com/thinkmill/keystatic/blob/main/design-system/primitives/README.md#_snippet_0

LANGUAGE: json
CODE:
```
{
  "id": "collection-id",
  "name": "colors",
  "modes": {
    "1:0": "Light",
    "1:1": "Dark"
  },
  "variableIds": ["loads-of-ids"],
  "variables": [
    {
      "id": "token-id",
      "name": "alias/backgroundPressed",
      "type": "COLOR",
      "scopes": ["FRAME_FILL", "SHAPE_FILL"],
      "valuesByMode": {
        "1:0": {
          "type": "VARIABLE_ALIAS",
          "id": "id-of-token"
        },
        "1:1": {
          "type": "VARIABLE_ALIAS",
          "id": "id-of-token"
        }
      },
      "resolvedValuesByMode": {
        "1:0": {
          "resolvedValue": {
            "r": 0,
            "g": 0,
            "b": 0,
            "a": 0.114
          },
          "alias": "id-of-token",
          "aliasName": "scales/black"
        },
        "1:1": {
          "resolvedValue": {
            "r": 1,
            "g": 1,
            "b": 1,
            "a": 0.124
          },
          "alias": "id-of-token",
          "aliasName": "scales/white"
        }
      }
    }
  ]
}
```

--------------------------------

TITLE: Start Next.js Development Server
DESCRIPTION: Commands to start the Next.js development server using various package managers. Requires Node.js and a package manager (npm, yarn, pnpm, or bun) to be installed.

SOURCE: https://github.com/thinkmill/keystatic/blob/main/dev-projects/next-blocks-builder/README.md#_snippet_0

LANGUAGE: bash
CODE:
```
npm run dev
```

LANGUAGE: bash
CODE:
```
yarn dev
```

LANGUAGE: bash
CODE:
```
pnpm dev
```

LANGUAGE: bash
CODE:
```
bun dev
```

--------------------------------

TITLE: Install and Run Keystatic Dev Project
DESCRIPTION: Instructions to install dependencies using pnpm, navigate to a specific example project directory, and run the development server for Keystatic. This setup is intended for local development within the monorepo.

SOURCE: https://github.com/thinkmill/keystatic/blob/main/README.md#_snippet_0

LANGUAGE: shell
CODE:
```
pnpm install
cd dev-projects/{example}
pnpm run dev
```

--------------------------------

TITLE: Create Keystatic Project
DESCRIPTION: Use this command to initiate the creation of a new Keystatic project via the command line interface.

SOURCE: https://github.com/thinkmill/keystatic/blob/main/packages/create/README.md#_snippet_0

LANGUAGE: bash
CODE:
```
npx create @keystatic
```

--------------------------------

TITLE: Install Keystatic Dependencies with npm
DESCRIPTION: Installs the necessary project dependencies using npm. This command should be run in the project's root directory after cloning or setting up the project.

SOURCE: https://github.com/thinkmill/keystatic/blob/main/templates/astro/README.md#_snippet_0

LANGUAGE: bash
CODE:
```
npm install
```

--------------------------------

TITLE: Update Size Scale Naming Convention
DESCRIPTION: Illustrates a change in defining size scale tokens, shifting from descriptive keys to using pixel values directly. This aims to simplify the abstraction and improve consistency.

SOURCE: https://github.com/thinkmill/keystatic/blob/main/design-system/primitives/README.md#_snippet_1

LANGUAGE: diff
CODE:
```
- '200': {
-   $value: '16px',
-   $type: 'dimension',
- }
+ '16': {
+   $value: '16px',
+   $type: 'dimension',
+ }
```

--------------------------------

TITLE: Start Remix App in Development Mode
DESCRIPTION: Starts the Remix application in development mode. The server automatically rebuilds assets when files change, providing a live development experience.

SOURCE: https://github.com/thinkmill/keystatic/blob/main/templates/remix/README.md#_snippet_0

LANGUAGE: shell
CODE:
```
npm run dev
```

--------------------------------

TITLE: Install Keystatic Dependencies
DESCRIPTION: Installs the necessary Node.js packages for the project, including Keystatic and its dependencies. This command should be run in the project's root directory.

SOURCE: https://github.com/thinkmill/keystatic/blob/main/templates/nextjs/README.md#_snippet_0

LANGUAGE: bash
CODE:
```
npm install
```

--------------------------------

TITLE: Run Keystatic Next.js Development Server
DESCRIPTION: Starts the development server for the Next.js application, enabling hot-reloading and providing access to the Keystatic Admin UI. This command is used during development.

SOURCE: https://github.com/thinkmill/keystatic/blob/main/templates/nextjs/README.md#_snippet_1

LANGUAGE: bash
CODE:
```
npm run dev
```

--------------------------------

TITLE: Build Remix App for Production
DESCRIPTION: Builds the Remix application for production deployment. This command optimizes assets and creates a production-ready bundle.

SOURCE: https://github.com/thinkmill/keystatic/blob/main/templates/remix/README.md#_snippet_1

LANGUAGE: shell
CODE:
```
npm run build
```

--------------------------------

TITLE: Run Remix App in Production Mode
DESCRIPTION: Runs the production-ready build of the Remix application. This command is used after building the app for deployment.

SOURCE: https://github.com/thinkmill/keystatic/blob/main/templates/remix/README.md#_snippet_2

LANGUAGE: shell
CODE:
```
npm start
```
